title: #5 DAX Fridays! 101: Order of evaluation for DAX formulas
excerpt: It is time to get cracking again with some DAX 101, this time we will talk about in what order DAX executes its functions. Happy Friday!  Get Northwind Dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU  Link to DAX Fridays survey: http://bit.ly/2MMM4KK   Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
